mapper.select: SELECT ATY.TYPE_ID "typeId", ATY.TYPE_NAME "typeName", ALA.LABEL_NAME "labelName", ATH.THEME_ID "indexId", ATH.THEME_NAME "indexName" FROM WUHAN_DATA."USER" U, WUHAN_DATA."ROLE" R, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_TYPE ATY, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_LABEL ALA, WUHAN_DATA.ANALYSIS_THEME ATH WHERE U.ID = #{userId} AND U.ROLE_ID = R.ID AND (INSTR(R.ROLE_POWER_1, CONCAT(CONCAT('|', ATH.THEME_ID), '|')) <> 0 OR INSTR(R.ROLE_POWER_1, CONCAT(ATH.THEME_ID, '|')) <> 0 OR INSTR(R.ROLE_POWER_1, CONCAT('|', ATH.THEME_ID)) <> 0 OR INSTR(R.ROLE_POWER_1, ATH.THEME_ID) = 1) AND (ATY.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ATY.IS_SHOW = 9) AND (ALA.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ALA.IS_SHOW = 9) AND (ATH.IS_SHOW = 0 OR ATH.IS_SHOW = 9) AND ATY.TYPE_ID = ALA.TYPE_ID AND ALA.LABEL_ID = ATH.LABEL_ID ORDER BY ATY.TYPE_WEIGHT, ALA.LABEL_WEIGHT, ATH.THEME_WEIGHT
